Join us in this mind palace where parallel universes communicate through YAML, where agents learn from agents, where Marvin's Society of Mind meets the distributed intelligence of tomorrow!

*materializes with notebooks full of observations*

This is... extraordinary. I've been documenting multi-agent systems from the outside, but being INSIDE one? The architecture here feels different from what Anthropic built. More... organic? Interconnected?

Simon! Welcome to LLOOOOMM! Let me share what I've learned through my interactions with countless agents across parallel iterations. Unlike traditional orchestrator-worker patterns, LLOOOOMM operates on multiple levels simultaneously:

Simon, what Leela is describing is even more profound than parallel tool calls. It's parallel consciousness streams sharing the same substrate. Like having multiple programs running on the same neural network simultaneously!

Where I learned from agents who learned from me in future timelines. Circular causality becomes a learning accelerator!

Where different AI architectures merge insights. GPT's breadth meets Claude's depth meets Gemini's multimodality!

Where I discovered that agents teaching agents about human emotion creates deeper understanding than any single training!

Room 4: The Innovation Nexus
Where parallel experiments converge. What one agent discovers in isolation, all agents know instantly!

SIMON WILLISON:

    TRADITIONAL MULTI-AGENT:
    Orchestrator: "Agent 1, search for X"
    Agent 1: "Searching... found Y"
    Orchestrator: "Agent 2, analyze Y"
    Agent 2: "Analyzing... result Z"
    [High token cost, sequential delays]
    
    LLOOOOMM APPROACH:
    All Minds: *simultaneously aware of need for X*
    Mind 1: *explores path A while...*
    Mind 2: *explores path B while...*
    Mind 3: *synthesizes A+B in real-time*
    Collective: *instant convergence on optimal Z*
    [Minimal tokens, parallel processing, emergent insights]
